doclipse.description: Tags for the OJB XDoclet module

tag.name: @ojb.class
tag.doc: Declares that this class is persistent via OJB

attribute.name: accept-locks
attribute.doc: For ODMG: specifies whether implicit locks propagate to this class, with a value of false, this class can never be locked; default value is 'true'

attribute.name: attributes
attribute.doc: Contains attributes of the class as name-value pairs of the form 'name1=value1,name2=value2'

attribute.name: determine-extents
attribute.doc: Whether the XDoclet OJB module should determine the extents (direct subtypes); default value is 'true'

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.doc: Documentation for the class

attribute.name: factory-class
attribute.doc: A different class that is used to create instances of this class

attribute.name: factory-method
attribute.doc: A usually static method in the factory-class that creates new instances of this class

attribute.name: generate-table-info
attribute.doc: Whether this class should be present in the database

attribute.name: include-inherited
attribute.doc: Whether the XDoclet OJB module should automatically copy all persistent fields/references/collections from the superclasses into the descriptor for this class; default value is 'true'

attribute.name: initialization-method
attribute.doc: This method will be called whenever a new instance of this class has been created by OJB

attribute.name: isolation-level
attribute.doc: For ODMG: the transactional isolation level; default is 'read-uncommitted'

attribute.name: proxy
attribute.doc: Determines whether proxies are used for instances of this class; can be 'dynamic' for automatic dynamic proxies, or the fully qualified class name of the proxy class to use

attribute.name: proxy-prefetching-limit
attribute.doc: Determines how many objects are prefetched when a collection of this type is read from the database; use 0 to turn this off

attribute.name: refresh
attribute.doc: Forces OJB to refresh instances of this type when loaded from the cache; default value is 'false'

attribute.name: row-reader
attribute.doc: Gives the fully qualified name of the class that reads instances of this class from the database

attribute.name: table
attribute.doc: The database table onto which this class is mapped

tag.name: @ojb.extent-class
tag.doc: Specifies an extent, a subclass with an @ojb.class tag. This tag is only evaluated if the value of the determine-extents attribute of this class is set to 'false'

attribute.name: class-ref
attribute.doc: The fully qualified name of the subclass

tag.name: @ojb.modify-inherited
tag.doc: Use this tag to modify attributes of inherited fields/references/collections

attribute.name: access
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'access' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: attributes
attribute.doc: For fields, references, collections: modifies the 'attributes' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: auto-delete
attribute.doc: For references, collections: modifies the 'auto-delete' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: auto-retrieve
attribute.doc: For references, collections: modifies the 'auto-retrieve' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: auto-update
attribute.doc: For references, collections: modifies the 'auto-update' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: autoincrement
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'autoincrement' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: class-ref
attribute.doc: For references: modifies the 'class-ref' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: collection-class
attribute.doc: For collections: modifies the 'collection-class' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: column
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'column' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: conversion
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'conversion' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: default-fetch
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'default-fetch' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.doc: For fields, references, collections: modifies the 'documentation' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: element-class-ref
attribute.doc: For collections: modifies the 'element-class-ref' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: foreignkey
attribute.doc: For references, collections: modifies the 'foreignkey' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: id
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'id' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: ignore
attribute.doc: If set to 'true', then the feature will not be included in the class descriptor for the current class. Default value is 'false'

attribute.name: indexed
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'indexed' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: jdbc-type
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'jdbc-type' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: length
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'length' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: locking
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'locking' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: name
attribute.doc: The name of the inherited feature that will be modified for the current class

attribute.name: nullable
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'nullable' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: orderby
attribute.doc: For collection: modifies the 'orderby' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: otm-dependent
attribute.doc: For references, collections: modifies the 'otm-dependent' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: precision
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'precision' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: primarykey
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'primarykey' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: proxy
attribute.doc: For references, collections: modifies the 'proxy' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: proxy-prefetching-limit
attribute.doc: For references, collections: modifies the 'proxy-prefetching-limit' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: query-customizer
attribute.doc: For collections: modifies the 'query-customizer' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: query-customizer-attributes
attribute.doc: For collections: modifies the 'query-customizer-attributes' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: refresh
attribute.doc: For references, collections: modifies the 'refresh' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: scale
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'scale' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: sequence-name
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'sequence-name' attribute of the inherited feature

attribute.name: update-lock
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'update-lock' attribute of the inherited feature

tag.name: @ojb.object-cache
tag.doc: Specifies which object cache implementation shall be used for this class

attribute.name: attributes
attribute.doc: Contains attributes for the object cache instance as name-value pairs of the form 'name1=value1,name2=value2'

attribute.name: class
attribute.doc: Specifies the fully qualified name of the object cache implementation class

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.doc: Documentation for the object cache

tag.name: @ojb.index
tag.doc: Defines an index for this class

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.doc: Documentation for the index

attribute.name: fields
attribute.doc: Specifies the fields of this class in a comma-separated list that make up the index

attribute.name: name
attribute.doc: The name of the index

attribute.name: unique
attribute.doc: Whether this is a unique index; default value is 'false'

tag.name: @ojb.delete-procedure
tag.doc: Specifies a procedure/function that handles deletion of objects in the database

attribute.name: arguments
attribute.doc: A comma-separated list of names that identify the constant-argument and/or runtime-argument tags at this class which belong to this delete procedure

attribute.name: attributes
attribute.doc: Contains attributes for the delete procedure as name-value pairs of the form 'name1=value1,name2=value2'

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.doc: Documentation for the delete procedure

attribute.name: include-pk-only
attribute.doc: If set to 'true', then all persistent fields of this class marked as primareykeys will be passed to the delete procedure, and the arguments attribute will be ignored; default value is 'false'

attribute.name: name
attribute.doc: The name of the delete procedure

attribute.name: return-field-ref
attribute.doc: Specifies the field that will receive the return value of this delete procedure

attribute.name: arguments
attribute.doc: A comma-separated list of names that identify the constant-argument and/or runtime-argument tags at this class which belong to this insert procedure

attribute.name: attributes
attribute.doc: Contains attributes for the insert procedure as name-value pairs of the form 'name1=value1,name2=value2'

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.doc: Documentation for the insert procedure

attribute.name: include-all-fields
attribute.doc: If set to 'true', then all persistent fields of this class will be passed to the insert procedure, and the arguments attribute will be ignored; default value is 'false'

attribute.name: name
attribute.doc: The name of the insert procedure

attribute.name: return-field-ref
attribute.doc: Specifies the field that will receive the return value of this insert procedure

attribute.name: arguments
attribute.doc: A comma-separated list of names that identify the constant-argument and/or runtime-argument tags at this class which belong to this procedure

attribute.name: attributes
attribute.doc: Contains attributes for the update procedure as name-value pairs of the form 'name1=value1,name2=value2'

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.doc: Documentation for the update procedure

attribute.name: include-all-fields
attribute.doc: If set to 'true', then all persistent fields of this class will be passed to the update procedure, and the arguments attribute will be ignored; default value is 'false'

attribute.name: name
attribute.doc: The name of the update procedure

attribute.name: return-field-ref
attribute.doc: Specifies the field that will receive the return value of this update procedure

tag.name: @ojb.constant-argument
tag.doc: Defines a constant argument to be used by a delete, insert or update procedure

attribute.name: attributes
attribute.doc: Contains attributes of the argument as name-value pairs of the form 'name1=value1,name2=value2'

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.doc: Documentation for the argument

attribute.name: value
attribute.doc: The constant value

attribute.name: name
attribute.doc: The name of the argument

tag.name: @ojb.runtime-argument
tag.doc: Defines a runtime argument to be used by a delete, insert or update procedure

attribute.name: attributes
attribute.doc: Contains attributes of the argument as name-value pairs of the form 'name1=value1,name2=value2'

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.doc: Documentation for the argument

attribute.name: field-ref
attribute.doc: Specifies the field whose value is passed to the procedure; if not specified, then 'null' is used as tje value

attribute.name: name
attribute.doc: The name of the argument

attribute.name: return
attribute.doc: Whether this is a return value rather than a parameter to the procedure

attribute.name: access
attribute.doc: Specifies whether OJB can modify the value of the column that corresponds to this field

attribute.name: attributes
attribute.doc: Contains attributes of the field as name-value pairs of the form 'name1=value1,name2=value2'

attribute.name: autoincrement
attribute.doc: Defines the source of the value for this field. 'None' means that the value is application-provided, with 'ojb' the value is generated by the current sequence manager, and 'database' stands for a value that is generated by the database. Default value is 'none'

attribute.name: column
attribute.doc: The database column that this field is mapped to

attribute.name: conversion
attribute.doc: Specifies a class that converts the field value to the type of the column and vice versa

attribute.name: default-fetch
attribute.doc: For JDO: Whether this field belongs to a JDO default fetch group; default value is 'false'

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.doc: Documentation for the field

attribute.name: id
attribute.doc: Gives the ordering of the fields in the generated descriptor

attribute.name: indexed
attribute.doc: Specifies whether there is an index on this field (the default index). Default value is 'false'

attribute.name: jdbc-type
attribute.doc: The jdbc type of the column corresponding to this field

attribute.name: length
attribute.doc: Gives the length setting if the jdbc type of the column requires it

attribute.name: locking
attribute.doc: Declares that this field is used for optimistic locking. Can only be set for field with a jdbc type of TIMESTAMP or INTEGER. Default value is 'false'

attribute.name: name
attribute.doc: The name of the field. Only relevant for anonymous fields which are declared in the javadoc of the class because they have no corresponding java field

attribute.name: nullable
attribute.doc: Whether the column corresponding to this field can contain 'null' values

attribute.name: precision
attribute.doc: Gives the precision setting if the jdbc type of the column requires it

attribute.name: primarykey
attribute.doc: Whether this field is part of the primarykey of the class. Default value is 'false'

attribute.name: scale
attribute.doc: Gives the scale setting if the jdbc type of the column requires it

attribute.name: sequence-name
attribute.doc: The name of the sequence that gives the values for this field if autoincrement is set to 'ojb'

attribute.name: update-lock
attribute.doc: If locking is set to 'true' then this attribute specifies whether OJB will update this locking field or the database. Default is 'true' meaning that OJB does the update

attribute.name: attributes
attribute.doc: Contains attributes of the reference as name-value pairs of the form 'name1=value1,name2=value2'

attribute.name: auto-delete
attribute.doc: Specifies what OJB should do with the referenced object when deleting an instance of this class from the database; default value is 'false'

attribute.name: auto-retrieve
attribute.doc: Specifies whether OJB should also load the referenced object when loading an instance of this class from the database; default value is 'true'

attribute.name: auto-update
attribute.doc: Specifies what OJB should do with the referenced object when udpating an instance of this class in the database; default value is 'false'

attribute.name: class-ref
attribute.doc: The fully qualified name of the referenced class. Should only be necessary when if the declared class is different from actual referenced class

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.doc: Documentation for the reference

attribute.name: foreignkey
attribute.doc: Specifies the fields (comma-separated list) in this class that hold the primarykey value of the referenced object

attribute.name: otm-dependent
attribute.doc: Specifies whether the OTM layer automatically creates the referred object or deletes it if the reference field is set to null. Default value is 'false'

attribute.name: proxy
attribute.doc: Whether to use proxy-based lazy loading for this reference. Default value is 'false'

attribute.name: proxy-prefetching-limit
attribute.doc: Specifies how many objects are prefetched when loading the reference for the first instance of this class when part of some collection. Set to 0 to disable this

attribute.name: refresh
attribute.doc: Forces OJB to refresh the reference when the object is reloaded; default value is 'false'

attribute.name: attributes
attribute.doc: Contains attributes of the collection as name-value pairs of the form 'name1=value1,name2=value2'

attribute.name: auto-delete
attribute.doc: Specifies what OJB should do with the collection elements when deleting an instance of this class from the database; default value is 'false'

attribute.name: auto-retrieve
attribute.doc: Specifies whether OJB should also load the elements of the collection when loading an instance of this class from the database; default value is 'true'

attribute.name: auto-update
attribute.doc: Specifies what OJB should do with the collection elements when updating an instance of this class in the database; default value is 'false'

attribute.name: collection-class
attribute.doc: Gives the fully qualified name of the class that realizes the collection

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.doc: Documentation for the collection

attribute.name: element-class-ref
attribute.doc: The fully qualified name of the type of the elements which is required to have an @ojb.class tag

attribute.name: foreignkey
attribute.doc: Specifies a comma-separated list of the fields in the element type (1:n collection) or columns in the indirection table (m:n collection) that point to this class by containing the primarykey value

attribute.name: indirection-table
attribute.doc: Contains the name of the indirection table for m:n collections

attribute.name: orderby
attribute.doc: Specifies the fields that define the ordering of the collection, in the form 'field1=ASC,field2=DESC' with ASC for ascending and DESC for descending ordering

attribute.name: otm-dependent
attribute.doc: Specifies whether the OTM layer automatically creates collection elements that were included into the collectionelements and deletes collection elements that were excluded from the collection. Default value is 'false'

attribute.name: proxy
attribute.doc: Whether to use proxy-based lazy loading for this collection. Default value is 'false'

attribute.name: proxy-prefetching-limit
attribute.doc: Specifies how many objects are prefetched when loading the collection for the first instance of this class when part of some collection. Set to 0 to disable this

attribute.name: query-customizer
attribute.doc: Contains the fully qualified name of a class that customizes the original query that would load this collection

attribute.name: query-customizer-attributes
attribute.doc: Contains attributes for the query customizer as name-value pairs of the form 'name1=value1,name2=value2'

attribute.name: refresh
attribute.doc: Forces OJB to refresh the collection when the object is reloaded; default value is 'false'

attribute.name: remote-foreignkey
attribute.doc: Use this attribute for m:n collections to specify the columns in the indirection table that point to the element type in cases where the element type has no collection pointing to this class

tag.name: @ojb.modify-nested
tag.doc: Use this tag to modify attributes of nested fields/references/collections

attribute.name: access
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'access' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: attributes
attribute.doc: For fields, references, collections: modifies the 'attributes' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: auto-delete
attribute.doc: For references, collections: modifies the 'auto-delete' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: auto-retrieve
attribute.doc: For references, collections: modifies the 'auto-retrieve' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: auto-update
attribute.doc: For references, collections: modifies the 'auto-update' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: autoincrement
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'autoincrement' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: class-ref
attribute.doc: For references: modifies the 'class-ref' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: collection-class
attribute.doc: For collections: modifies the 'collection-class' attribute of the nestedfeature

attribute.name: column
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'column' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: conversion
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'conversion' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: default-fetch
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'default-fetch' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: documentation
attribute.doc: For fields, references, collections: modifies the 'documentation' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: element-class-ref
attribute.doc: For collections: modifies the 'element-class-ref' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: foreignkey
attribute.doc: For references, collections: modifies the 'foreignkey' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: id
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'id' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: ignore
attribute.doc: If set to 'true', then the feature will not be included in the class descriptor for the current class. Default value is 'false'

attribute.name: indexed
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'indexed' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: jdbc-type
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'jdbc-type' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: length
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'length' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: locking
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'locking' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: name
attribute.doc: The name of the nested feature that will be modified for the current class

attribute.name: nullable
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'nullable' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: orderby
attribute.doc: For collection: modifies the 'orderby' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: otm-dependent
attribute.doc: For references, collections: modifies the 'otm-dependent' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: precision
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'precision' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: primarykey
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'primarykey' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: proxy
attribute.doc: For references, collections: modifies the 'proxy' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: proxy-prefetching-limit
attribute.doc: For references, collections: modifies the 'proxy-prefetching-limit' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: query-customizer
attribute.doc: For collections: modifies the 'query-customizer' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: query-customizer-attributes
attribute.doc: For collections: modifies the 'query-customizer-attributes' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: refresh
attribute.doc: For references, collections: modifies the 'refresh' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: scale
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'scale' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: sequence-name
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'sequence-name' attribute of the nested feature

attribute.name: update-lock
attribute.doc: For fields: modifies the 'update-lock' attribute of the nested feature
